name: Aberrant Spirit
languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages you speak

trait.name: Regeneration (Slaadi Only)
text: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
text: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
text: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

action.name: Claws (Slaadi Only)
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
text: Melee Spell Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.
